common_issues.title: Pieces OS Update and Feature Bugs
common_issues.description: Users are experiencing issues with Pieces OS updates failing, Personal Domain backup/restore not working as expected, and features like secret messages encountering errors.  Suggested solutions include updating Windows App Installer, verifying personal domain registration, and using the refresh button for restore.  The Pieces team is investigating these issues.

related_issues.title: Personal Domain backup
related_issues.text:
Personal Domain backup
### Checked for Existing Issues?

- [x] Yes, I have checked existing issues and cannot find one related to this.

### Software

Desktop Application

### Operating System / Platform

Windows

### Your Pieces OS Version

11.2.2

### Early Access Program

- [x] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

I want to sync this PC to another PC，but i cann't backup the lastest data.
![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/bfb4fb14-5e7f-45c7-828f-5f77f550453a)

this is another PC

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/3c2d880e-a1b2-40c1-82b1-9935bffbf8fb)
## GitHub Issue Conversation Summary

**Key Points Raised:**

* User is unable to change their personal domain after copying com.pieces.os and com.pieces.pfd folders to another PC. 
* User is unable to back up their current computer with Personal Domain and restore it to a new computer.
* User has concerns about using an older backup to restore their new computer.

**Problems Identified:**

* Personal Domain registration appears to be failing.
* Backup/restore functionality is not working as expected.

**Solutions Proposed/Implemented:**

* Verify if the personal domain is already registered. If not, attempt to register a new one.
* Use the refresh button to initiate a restore from the cloud backup.
* Consider using a newer backup for restoration, if available.

**Current Status/Outcome:**

The user's issue with the personal domain and backup/restore functionality has not been fully resolved. They require further assistance from support. 

**Additional Notes:**

* The issue was opened on March 8th, 2025 and has not been closed as of this summary.
* The user provided screenshots to illustrate the problem they are facing.
* The support team responded to the user within the promised 24-hour timeframe.

I hope this summary is helpful! Please let me know if you have any other questions.

related_issues.title: Pieces OS Update fails
related_issues.text:
Pieces OS Update fails
### Checked for Existing Issues?

- [x] Yes, I have checked existing issues and cannot find one related to this.

### Software

Desktop Application

### Operating System / Platform

Windows

### Your Pieces OS Version

11.2.1

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

The notification popped up saying an update was available so I clicked Update and a few seconds later got this message box:

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/b14dc8ab-632a-4095-b45b-7bbaba3c70ce)

This is on a very fresh Windows 11 installation.
## GitHub Issue Conversation Summary

**Key Points Raised:**

* @ThatRendle reported that PiecesOS was unable to launch on Windows.
* @nathan-courtney-pieces suggested updating Windows App Installer and inquired about launch attempts and ability to use other integrations.
* @bejokun reported the same issue and received a trojan detection.

**Problems Identified:**

* PiecesOS failing to launch on Windows.
* Potential bug related to Windows App Installer.
* Trojan detection for some users.

**Solutions Proposed/Implemented:**

* Update Windows App Installer.
* Investigate further to identify the root cause of the launch failure.
* Address the trojan detection issue.

**Current Status/Outcome:**

* The issue is under investigation.
* No permanent solution has been implemented yet.
* Users are advised to update Windows App Installer and report further details.

related_issues.title: "Secret Message" Example doesn't work properly
related_issues.text:
"Secret Message" Example doesn't work properly
### Checked for Existing Issues?

- [x] Yes, I have checked existing issues and cannot find one related to this.

### Software

Desktop Application

### Operating System / Platform

macOS

### Your Pieces OS Version

11.2.1

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

When using LTM-2 to test the secret message example:
https://pieces.app/magic-moments/ltm

I got a strange response from the LLM:
Claude 3.5:
First Try:
![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/1962a3e4-8b02-4d3f-bc8c-4bdd72c80aa6)
2. try: (waited longer on the website)
![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/cd71c5c1-d5d5-4449-acd5-e070fb244fa9)

Gemini 2.0 Flash did fail completely:
![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/50735f7a-28a1-4563-b490-e10c271eca23)
## GitHub Issue Conversation Summary

**Key Points Raised**:

* Multiple users reported encountering the "basic mode due to device constraints" message in PiecesOS.
* Affected users were running macOS 15.3.1 on M3 Macs.
* This issue prevented the secret message functionality and agent roll-ups from working correctly.

**Proposed Solutions/Implemented**:

* Closing and reopening PiecesOS seems to resolve the problem for some users.

**Current Status/Outcome**:

* The cause of the issue is still being investigated by the Pieces team.
* A permanent fix is not yet available.
* Closing and reopening PiecesOS can be used as a workaround in the meantime.

**Additional Details**:

* The documentation does not currently contain information about "basic mode due to device constraints".
* This issue may also affect users running other operating systems or device models.

**Overall**:

This is an ongoing issue that the Pieces team is working to fix. Users who encounter this message are encouraged to report it and try the suggested workaround.

common_issues.title: Pieces OS bugs and errors reported by users
common_issues.description: Users are reporting various bugs and errors in Pieces OS, including issues with the secret message example, update failures, and Chrome extension problems. Some issues appear to be platform-specific, while others are affecting multiple operating systems. Proposed solutions and workarounds vary depending on the specific problem. The Pieces team is actively investigating these issues and working on fixes.

related_issues.title: Chrome Extension messing out stackoverflow
related_issues.text:
Chrome Extension messing out stackoverflow
### Checked for Existing Issues?

- [x] Yes, I have checked existing issues and cannot find one related to this.

### Software

Desktop Application, Web Extension

### Operating System / Platform

macOS

### Your Pieces OS Version

11.2.2

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

It fills this text endlessly...

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/6b5edb10-b7cf-4fa6-a523-aa73af94cbee)
## GitHub Issue Summary

**Key Points:**

* User @luceat-lux-vestra reported an issue.
* The issue was automatically triaged and routed to the proper team member.
* The user was asked to be patient and provided with helpful resources.

**Problems Identified:**

* The specific issue reported by the user is not mentioned in the conversation.

**Solutions Proposed/Implemented:**

* The issue is expected to be resolved in the next update.

**Current Status/Outcome:**

* The user is waiting for the issue to be resolved in the next update. No further information is available.

**Additional Notes:**

* The conversation only provides a brief overview of the issue and the support provided.

recommendations: Investigate and resolve the root cause of Pieces OS update failures, including potential issues with Windows App Installer.
Address the Personal Domain backup/restore functionality issues to ensure users can seamlessly transfer data between devices.
Investigate and fix the bug causing the "Secret Message" example to fail, particularly for macOS users and specific LLM integrations.
Look into the Chrome Extension issue reported on Stack Overflow, ensuring it doesn't interfere with website functionality.
Provide clear and consistent communication to users regarding ongoing issues, workarounds, and expected resolution timelines.
